overview: Fiona joined Arts Alliance Media in September 2002 and is currently Chief Operating Officer. Fiona has been responsible for the growth and operations of Arts Alliance Mediaâ€™s digital cinema business in the UK and Europe. After heading up the successful rollout and operation of the UK Film Councilâ€™s Digital Screen Network, the worldâ€™s first 2K digital cinema network, Fiona negotiated the first pan-European digital cinema deals with 5 Hollywood studios. She currently oversees operations, content processing and alternative content. Fiona joined AAM from AtomShockwave, where she was Director of Business Development for Europe. Previously she held strategy positions at BBC online and at Bertelsmannâ€™s online subsidiary, bol.com. Prior to that, she worked for Mercer Management Consulting in their London and New York offices, focusing on telecommunications projects. Fiona has a BA in Natural Sciences from the University of Cambridge.
